channel.title: Random framerate drops
channel.description:
I get well over 60 frames in all source games.
My specs: CPU - 1090T 6 Core @ 4.0Ghz RAM - 8GB DDR3 1333mhz GPU - 2 x ATI HD 5770s
I shouldn't have any problems running this game at a non-stop 60fps but I frequently get random drops to anywhere between 20-50 frames. Any ideas why this might be happening or how I could possibly fix it?
